title: Lombok for VS-Code
text:
Lombok for VS-Code

For VisualStudio Code there is an extension to activate lombok support in VS-Code.
We have this already preconfigured for you in our default settings. So for manual installation after setup, you can get it via this command:







However, to avoid manual extra effort for lombok based projects you only need to activate this plugin in your project specific settings in lombok.properties for vscode (replace false with true for plugin_active).
